suffix.name: NTP.ThirdParty
suffix.label: The NTP served by a third party (e.g. Bing)

suffix.name: Error
suffix.label: Connection to proxy resulted in an error

suffix.name: DiskCache
suffix.label: DiskCache backend is using disk cache.

suffix.name: MemoryCache
suffix.label: DiskCache backend is using memory cache.

suffix.name: WaitForDataReady
suffix.label: Tracks the last failure reason until WaitForDataReady or its callback is executed. This is recorded when data is ready in WaitForDataReady or when the callback is executed

suffix.name: IconsColor
suffix.label: Icons using a fallback color (favicon resolution too low).

suffix.name: IconsGray
suffix.label: Icons using a gray color (no favicon available).

suffix.name: IconsReal
suffix.label: Icons using an actual icon published by the site.

suffix.name: Thumbnail
suffix.label: Not an icon but a thumbnail/screenshot of the page.

suffix.name: ThumbnailFailed
suffix.label: Default gray box in place of a thumbnail/screenshot.

suffix.name: client0
suffix.obsolete: Hasn't been used for a while, as of 2016-07.

suffix.name: server0
suffix.obsolete: Hasn't been used for a while, as of 2016-07.

suffix.name: NewTab
suffix.label: NTP loaded on a new tab.

suffix.name: Active
suffix.label: For a tab active which is shown foreground in a browser window.

suffix.name: Inactive
suffix.label: For tabs in background and not shown to user.

suffix.name: Detached
suffix.label: For a tab that is being dragged by user to outside of the browser window.

suffix.name: Closed
suffix.label: For a tab that is about to be closed.

suffix.name: Fullscreen.Shown
suffix.label: A notification sent by a fullscreen app or webpage that is displayed.

suffix.name: Fullscreen.Suppressed
suffix.label: A notification sent by a fullscreen app or webpage that is not displayed.

suffix.name: Windowed
suffix.label: A notification sent by a non-fullscreen app or webpage.

suffix.name: Negative
suffix.label: Estimate of the metric was lower than observed metric

suffix.name: Positive
suffix.label: Estimate of the metric was higher than observed metric
Recorded approximately 15 seconds after navigation start
Recorded approximately 30 seconds after navigation start
Recorded approximately 60 seconds after navigation start

suffix.name: Unknown
suffix.label: Observed effective connection type was Unknown

suffix.name: Offline
suffix.label: Observed effective connection type was Offline

suffix.name: Slow2G
suffix.label: Observed effective connection type was Slow2G

suffix.name: Broadband
suffix.label: Observed effective connection type was Broadband
Observed metric was between 0 and 20 (inclusive) units
Observed metric was between 20 and 60 (inclusive) units
Observed metric was between 60 and 140 (inclusive) units
Observed metric was between 140 and 300 (inclusive) units
Observed metric was between 300 and 620 (inclusive) units
Observed metric was between 620 and 1260 (inclusive) units
Observed metric was between 1260 and 2540 (inclusive) units
Observed metric was between 2540 and 51000 (inclusive) units

suffix.name: 5100_Infinity
suffix.label: Observed metric was greater than 5100 (inclusive) units

suffix.name: Kbps
suffix.label: Records availability of the downstream throughput estimate.

suffix.name: RTT
suffix.label: Records availability of the HTTP RTT estimate.

suffix.name: TransportRTT
suffix.label: Records availability of the transport RTT estimate.

histogram_suffixes.name: OffDomainInclusionAbortReason
histogram_suffixes.obsolete: Deprecated 2016-05 as the OffDomainInclusionDetector was removed.

suffix.name: EmptyMainFrameURL
suffix.label: The main frame URL was empty.

suffix.name: HistoryLookupFailed
suffix.label: The lookup to the HistoryService failed.

suffix.name: Incognito
suffix.label: The profile associated with the frame under analysis is an incognito profile.

suffix.name: NoHistoryService
suffix.label: There was no HistoryService associated with the profile of the frame under analysis (this can happen seldomly on startup for early net requests, or on shutdown by the asynchronous nature of the analysis, but shouldn't be common).

suffix.name: NoProfile
suffix.label: The profile associated with the frame under analysis couldn't be resolved (expected to happen at a low frequency by the asynchronous nature of the analysis).

suffix.name: BG
suffix.label: Event occurred at least partially in the background

suffix.name: Background
suffix.label: The page was backgrounded at least once from navigation start to this event.

affected-histogram.name: PageLoad.Clients.ServiceWorker.Timing2.NavigationToFirstContentfulPaint
affected-histogram.obsolete: Deprecated in favor of PaintTiming equivalent.

suffix.name: AfterPaint
suffix.label: Limited to the duration of time starting after first paint, for page loads that reached first paint.

suffix.name: AtTimingCallbackDispatch
suffix.label: Evaluated at the time timing update calls are dispatched to observers.

suffix.name: Clients.AMP
suffix.label: AMP page load. Same page navigations are not tracked.

suffix.name: Clients.AMP.AmpCache
suffix.label: AMP page load from the AMP cache CDN.

suffix.name: Clients.AMP.GoogleSearch
suffix.label: AMP page load in the Google Search AMP viewer. Same page navigations are not tracked.

suffix.name: Clients.AMP.GoogleNews
suffix.label: AMP page load in the Google News AMP viewer. Same page navigations are not tracked.

suffix.name: Clients.AMPCache
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigations to an AMP cache page. Same page navigations are not tracked.

suffix.name: Clients.AMPCache2
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigations to an AMP cache page. Same page navigations are not tracked.

suffix.name: Clients.CssScanner
suffix.label: Metrics from pages scanned by the preload scanner for @import CSS rules

suffix.name: Clients.DataReductionProxy
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation through the data reduction proxy.

suffix.name: Clients.DataReductionProxy.LoFiOn
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation through the data reduction proxy with session in LoFi enabled or control field trial, and when the connection was slow.

suffix.name: NonProxied
suffix.label: Resources not loaded through data reduction proxy.

suffix.name: Proxied
suffix.label: Resources loaded through data reduction proxy.

suffix.name: Clients.DocWrite.Block
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics from a page that has synchronous, cross-origin document.written scripts that could be blocked if the document.write script blocking feature is enabled.

suffix.name: Clients.DocWrite.Evaluator
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics from a page that could have been evaluated by the DocumentWriteEvaluator

suffix.name: Clients.FromGoogleSearch
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation from a Google web search

suffix.name: Clients.FromGWS
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation from a Google web search

suffix.name: Clients.FromGWS2
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation from a Google web search

suffix.name: Clients.LoFi
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation caused by a tab restore.

suffix.name: Clients.MediaPageLoad
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics for page loads that involved playing a media element.

suffix.name: Clients.Previews.OfflinePages
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation that shows users an offline page preview. Offline page previews are shown when a user's effective connection type is prohibitively slow.

suffix.name: Clients.Protocol.H1
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation to main resource over HTTP/1.1

suffix.name: Clients.Protocol.H11
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation to main resource over HTTP/1.1

suffix.name: Clients.Protocol.H2
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation to main resource over HTTP/2

suffix.name: Clients.Protocol.QUIC
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation to main resource over QUIC

histogram_suffixes.name: PageLoadMetricsClientsReload
histogram_suffixes.obsolete: Deprecated at M53 in favor of LoadType.Reload.

suffix.name: Clients.Reload
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics from a page that is reloaded

suffix.name: Prefetchable
suffix.label: The predictor database contained subresources for prediction for a page

suffix.name: Clients.ServiceWorker
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics from a page that is controlled by a Service Worker

affected-histogram.name: PageLoad.Timing2.NavigationToFirstContentfulPaint
affected-histogram.obsolete: Deprecated in favor of PaintTiming equivalent.

suffix.name: Clients.SubresourceFilter
suffix.label: For pages with filtered subresources. Includes dryrun matches.

suffix.name: Clients.TabRestore
suffix.label: PageLoadMetrics that are a result of a navigation caused by a tab restore.

suffix.name: LoadType.NewNavigation
suffix.label: Restricted to new navigations (link clicks, URLs typed into the URL box, etc).

suffix.name: MediaPlayed
suffix.label: Limited to pages where media was played.

suffix.name: NoCommit
suffix.label: Limited to page loads that did not commit.

suffix.name: NoEndTime
suffix.label: The page load had no recorded end time, so an end time was synthesized at the time the page end notification was processed.

suffix.name: NoMediaPlayed
suffix.label: Limited to pages where no media was played.

suffix.name: WithoutPaint
suffix.label: The foreground duration for page loads did not reach first paint.

suffix.name: WithPaint
suffix.label: The foreground duration for page loads reached first paint.

suffix.name: UserGesture
suffix.label: Restricted to pages loaded via a user gesture.

suffix.name: UserInitiated
suffix.label: (experimental) Page load metric that is approximately user initiated

suffix.name: UserGesture
suffix.label: (experimental) Page load that has a user gesture

suffix.name: UserInputEvent
suffix.label: (experimental) Page load that has a user input event

suffix.name: BrowserInitiated
suffix.label: (experimental) Page load that was initiated from the browser process

suffix.name: HistoryLoad
suffix.label: but only for user pressing back or forward

suffix.name: LinkLoad
suffix.label: deprecated - see LinkLoadReload, LinkLoadNormal, LinkLoadStaleOk, LinkLoadCacheOnly; content initiated, commonly back to a posted page

suffix.name: LinkLoadCacheOnly
suffix.label: content initiated, commonly back to a posted page, where browser must ONLY use cache

suffix.name: LinkLoadNormal
suffix.label: content initiated, ordinary link traversal or post

suffix.name: LinkLoadStaleOk
suffix.label: content initiated, commonly forward or back where stale cached data is very acceptable

suffix.name: NormalLoad
suffix.label: but only for user entered URL or omnibox search

suffix.name: Reload
suffix.label: but only for user pressed reload

suffix.name: UndefLoad
suffix.label: should never happen... as it is only for an client-code error case which should not exist

suffix.name: HistoryLoad
suffix.label: but only for user pressing back or forward

suffix.name: LinkLoad
suffix.label: deprecated - see LinkLoadReload, LinkLoadNormal, LinkLoadStaleOk, LinkLoadCacheOnly; content initiated, commonly back to a posted page

suffix.name: LinkLoadCacheOnly
suffix.label: content initiated, commonly back to a posted page, where browser must ONLY use cache

suffix.name: LinkLoadNormal
suffix.label: content initiated, ordinary link traversal or post

suffix.name: LinkLoadStaleOk
suffix.label: content initiated, commonly forward or back where stale cached data is very acceptable

suffix.name: NormalLoad
suffix.label: but only for user entered URL or omnibox search

suffix.name: Reload
suffix.label: but only for user pressed reload

suffix.name: UndefLoad
suffix.label: should never happen... as it is only for an client-code error case which should not exist

suffix.name: ParallelizableDownload
suffix.label: Download that supports but doesn't use parallel requests.

suffix.name: WithParallelRequestsSingleStream
suffix.label: Bandwidth when only a single stream is active while using parallel requests. Other streams are either finished or haven't started.

suffix.name: WithParallelRequestsMultipleStreams
suffix.label: Bandwidth when multiple streams are active while using parallel requests.

suffix.name: PasswordFieldOnFocus
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by password field on focus event.

suffix.name: ProtectedPasswordEntry
suffix.label: Password protection triggered by password reuse event.

suffix.name: FromHttpRealm
suffix.label: The account in question was saved on an HTTP site.

suffix.name: FromHttpsRealm
suffix.label: The account in question was saved on a HTTPS site (including those with certificate issues).

suffix.name: OnHttpRealmWithSameHost
suffix.label: The number of other accounts whose realms have HTTP scheme and the same host as the account in question.

suffix.name: OnHttpsRealmWithSameHost
suffix.label: The number of other accounts whose realms have HTTPS scheme and the same host as the account in question.

suffix.name: OnHttpRealmWithDifferentHost
suffix.label: The number of other accounts whose realms have HTTP scheme and different hosts than the account in question.

suffix.name: OnHttpsRealmWithDifferentHost
suffix.label: The number of other accounts whose realms have HTTPS scheme and different hosts than the account in question.

suffix.name: OnAnyRealmWithDifferentHost
suffix.label: The number of other accounts whose realms have different hosts than the account in question, and their scheme is either HTTP or HTTPS.

suffix.name: OnPSLMatchingRealm
suffix.label: The number of other accounts whose realms are public suffix matches to that of the account in question (the scheme is always the same in these cases).

suffix.name: Android
suffix.label: The password is for an Android app.

suffix.name: Ftp
suffix.label: The scheme of the origin is FTP.

suffix.name: Http
suffix.label: The scheme of the origin is HTTP.

suffix.name: Https
suffix.label: The scheme of the origin is HTTPS.

suffix.name: Other
suffix.label: The scheme of the origin is something else.

suffix.name: UserAborted
suffix.label: The Payment Request was aborted by the user

suffix.name: OtherAborted
suffix.label: The Payment Request was aborted but not but the user

suffix.name: ContactInfo
suffix.label: For the contact info section of a Payment Request

suffix.name: CreditCards
suffix.label: For the credit card section of a Payment Request

suffix.name: ShippingAddress
suffix.label: For the shipping address section of a Payment Request

histogram_suffixes.name: PersistentMemoryAllocs
histogram_suffixes.obsolete: Deprecated 2/2017 for Issue 689315 which indicated they weren't being used.

suffix.name: LaunchFromDiagnostics
suffix.label: when the user launches the ListUrlActivity from the Physical Web diagnostics page

suffix.name: LaunchFromPreferences
suffix.label: when the user launches the ListUrlActivity from the Physical Web preferencs screen

suffix.name: infoCached
suffix.label: size of file-backed memory minus swap and buffer cache.

suffix.name: NoSetting
suffix.label: Engagement when no content setting set.

suffix.name: libpepflashplayer.so
suffix.label: Flash player on Linux or Cros

suffix.name: libwidevinecdmadapter.so
suffix.label: Widevine CDM on Linux or Cros

suffix.name: Cellular
suffix.label: covers fetches when connected to cellular networks

suffix.name: ContentPrefetchPrefetchOn
suffix.label: prefetch is enabled but prerender is disabled.

suffix.name: PrerenderNoUse
suffix.label: prerender is enabled, but pages are not swapped in.

suffix.name: PrerenderMulti
suffix.label: prerender is enabled with multiple simultanious prerenders.

suffix.name: Prerender5minTTL
suffix.label: prerender is enabled, and the TTL is extended to 5 minutes.

suffix.name: PrerenderMatchComplete
suffix.label: prerender is enabled, and match complete replacements are used to gather extended statistics.

suffix.name: Cold
suffix.label: Prefetch too old to skip revalidation.

suffix.name: Reference
suffix.label: No prefetch. Warning: do not compare with the load times of prefetched pages (bias).

suffix.name: Visible
suffix.label: Page visible for all of rendering.

suffix.name: none
suffix.label: No origin; in the case of prefetch TTFCP this is when no prefetch was involved.

suffix.name: webcross
suffix.label: Link triggered prerender, rel=prerender, cross domain.

suffix.name: websame
suffix.label: Link triggered prerender, rel=prerender, same domain.

suffix.name: offline
suffix.label: Prerender triggered for saving a page for offline use.

suffix.name: NonGAIA
suffix.label: Interaction was not initiated from GAIA

suffix.name: GAIASignout
suffix.label: GAIA-initiated interaction indicating a service type of Signout

suffix.name: GAIAIncognito
suffix.label: GAIA-initiated interaction indicating a service type of Incognito (used for DesktopMenu)

suffix.name: GAIASignoutIncognito
suffix.label: GAIA-initiated interaction indicating a service type of Signout and go Incognito (used for AndroidAccountManagementMenu)

suffix.name: GAIAAddSession
suffix.label: GAIA-initiated interaction indicating a service type of Add a Session

suffix.name: GAIAReAuth
suffix.label: GAIA-initiated interaction indicating a service type of Reauthenticate this user

suffix.name: GAIASignup
suffix.label: GAIA-initiated interaction indicating a service type of Add an account

suffix.name: GAIADefault
suffix.label: GAIA-initiated interaction indicating the default service type

suffix.name: ToOpenedProfile
suffix.label: The profile being switched to was already loaded and had at least one open browser

suffix.name: ToUnopenedProfile
suffix.label: The profile being switched to had not yet been loaded this Chrome session

suffix.name: ToOpenedProfileWithoutBrowser
suffix.label: The profile being switched to was already opened and had no active browsers

suffix.name: 100Percent_1MinSeen_A
suffix.label: Progressive scan @ all previously seen frequencies (A).

suffix.name: 100Percent_1MinSeen_B
suffix.label: Progressive scan @ all previously seen frequencies (B).

suffix.name: Applied
suffix.label: change has been accepted by user

suffix.name: Discarded
suffix.label: change has been reverted by user

suffix.name: Restored
suffix.label: search provider restored by Protector before showing the bubble

suffix.name: Timeout
suffix.label: change has been ignored by user (timed out)

suffix.name: BlinkGCKB
suffix.obsolete: Derecated as of 05/2017. Replaced with BlinkGCKB.30min, 60min, and 90min to investigate growth of BlinkGC memory usage more deeply.

suffix.name: DiscardableKB
suffix.obsolete: Derecated as of 05/2017. Replaced with DiscardableKB.30min, 60min, and 90min to investigate growth of discardable memory usage more deeply.

suffix.name: PartitionAllocKB
suffix.obsolete: Derecated as of 05/2017. Replaced with PartitionAllocKB.30min, 60min, and 90min to investigate growth of PartitionAlloc memory usage more deeply.

suffix.name: MallocKB
suffix.obsolete: Derecated as of 05/2017. Replaced with MallocKB.30min, 60min, and 90min to investigate growth of malloc memory usage more deeply.

suffix.name: TotalAllocatedKB
suffix.obsolete: Derecated as of 05/2017. Replaced with TotalAllocatedKB.30min, 60min, and 90min to investigate growth of renderer total memory usage more deeply.

suffix.name: V8MainThreadIsolateKB
suffix.obsolete: Derecated as of 05/2017. Replaced with V8MainThreadIsolateKB.30min, 60min, and 90min to investigate growth of v8 memory usage more deeply.

suffix.name: 30min
suffix.label: Constrained to each allocator 30min after purging

suffix.name: 60min
suffix.label: Constrained to each allocator 60min after purging

suffix.name: 90min
suffix.label: Constrained to each allocator 90min after purging

suffix.name: ForHTTP
suffix.label: Only insecure HTTP connections are counted.

suffix.name: ForHTTPS
suffix.label: Only secure HTTPS connections are counted.

suffix.name: SelectPort
suffix.label: An effort was mode to (try to) consistently connect using the same source port for the given server IP/port.

suffix.name: RandomPort
suffix.label: The operating system randomly selected a source port for the connection.

suffix.name: CachedServerConfig
suffix.label: Verification time for a server when server config from cache is used.
This metric includes both gpu and software raster.

suffix.name: Gpu
suffix.label: This metric is for only gpu raster.

suffix.name: Software
suffix.label: This metric is for only software raster.

suffix.name: Fast
suffix.label: Fast start by skipping normal chrome.dll startup.

suffix.name: Char
suffix.label: The Char event occurs on textual keyboard input.

suffix.name: GestureDoubleTap
suffix.label: A GestureDoubleTap occurs when the user double taps on a touchscreen.

suffix.name: GestureFlingCancel
suffix.label: A GestureFlingCancel is sent to the renderer to cancel any active flings.

suffix.name: GestureFlingStart
suffix.label: A GestureFlingStart is sent when the user quickly flicks on a touchscreen.

suffix.name: GestureLongPress
suffix.label: A GestureLongPress is sent when the user taps down and holds their finger on a touchscreen.

suffix.name: GestureLongTap
suffix.label: A GestureLongTap is sent when the user taps down on a touchscreen, holds their finger for a while, then releases.

suffix.name: GesturePinchBegin
suffix.label: A GesturePinchBegin is sent when a user starts a pinch zoom motion on a touchscreen.

suffix.name: GesturePinchEnd
suffix.label: A GesturePinchEnd is sent when the user releases their fingers from the touchscreen after performing a pinch zoom motion.

suffix.name: GesturePinchUpdate
suffix.label: GesturePinchUpdate events are sent while the user is performing a pinch zoom motion on a touch screen. GesturePinchUpdate events are sent as the user changes the distance between their fingers.

suffix.name: GestureScrollBegin
suffix.label: A GestureScrollBegin is sent at the beginning of a gesture scroll on a touchscreen.

suffix.name: GestureScrollEnd
suffix.label: A GestureScrollEnd is sent when the user releases their finger after a gesture scroll on a touchscreen.

suffix.name: GestureScrollUpdate
suffix.label: GestureScrollUpdate events are sent as the user drags their finger along the touchscreen during a gesture scroll.

suffix.name: GestureScrollUpdateWithoutPropagation
suffix.label: GestureScrollUpdateWithoutPropagation events are scroll updates that shouldn't bubble, generated by a gesture fling.

suffix.name: GestureShowPress
suffix.label: A GestureShowPress event is sent when the user presses down on the touchscreen but before a GestureTapDown.

suffix.name: GestureTap
suffix.label: A GestureTap is sent when the user presses down and releases on a touchscreen.

suffix.name: GestureTapUnconfirmed
suffix.label: A GestureTapUnconfirmed is sent when the user taps the touchscreen but, due to a delay, the GestureTap isn't sent yet.

suffix.name: GestureTapCancel
suffix.label: A GestureTapCancel is sent to cancel a pending GestureTap event. For example, if the user taps down but drags their finger instead of releasing it.

suffix.name: GestureTapDown
suffix.label: A GestureTapDown is sent when the user presses on the touchscreen in what could potentially be a full GestureTap event.

suffix.name: GestureTwoFingerTap
suffix.label: A GestureTwoFingerTap is sent when the user presses down a releases on a touchscreen with two fingers.

suffix.name: KeyDown
suffix.label: A KeyDown event is sent when a keyboard key is pressed down.

suffix.name: KeyUp
suffix.label: A KeyUp event is sent when a depressed keyboard key is released.

suffix.name: MouseDown
suffix.label: A MouseDown event is sent when the user click down a mouse button.

suffix.name: MouseEnter
suffix.label: A MouseEnter event is sent when the mouse cursor enters the renderer area.

suffix.name: MouseLeave
suffix.label: A MouseLeave event is sent when the mouse cursor leaves the renderer area.

suffix.name: MouseMove
suffix.label: A MouseMove event is sent when the mouse cursor moves within the renderer area.

suffix.name: MouseUp
suffix.label: A MouseUp event is sent when a depressed mouse button is released.

suffix.name: MouseWheel
suffix.label: A MouseWheel event is sent when the user scrolls using the mouse wheel within the renderer area.

suffix.name: RawKeyDown
suffix.label: A RawKeyDown event is a wrapper around a native key event.

suffix.name: TouchCancel
suffix.label: A TouchCancel is used to cancel an existing touch point. For example, if the user drags a finger outside the bounds of the renderer.

suffix.name: TouchEnd
suffix.label: A TouchEnd is send when the user lifts a finger from the touchscreen.

suffix.name: TouchMove
suffix.label: A TouchMove is sent when the user moves a finger along the touchscreen.

suffix.name: TouchStart
suffix.label: A TouchStart is sent when the user first touches a finger to the touchscreen.

suffix.name: NonDiscardableTotalAllocated
suffix.label: Summed over the PartitionAlloc, malloc, mainThreadIsolate() and BlinkGC allocators

suffix.name: TotalAllocatedPerRenderView
suffix.label: TotalAllocated divided by the number of RenderViews

suffix.name: V8MainThreadIsolate
suffix.label: Constrained to memory usage by mainThreadIsolate()

suffix.name: TotalAllocated
suffix.label: Summed over the PartitionAlloc, malloc, discardable memory, mainThreadIsolate() and BlinkGC allocators

suffix.name: PrivateMemoryFootprint
suffix.label: Only counting private resident + swapped/compressed memory.

suffix.name: DidFinishLoad
suffix.label: Recorded each time DidFinishLoad is called for *any* frame within the page.

suffix.name: MainFrameDidFinishLoad
suffix.label: Recorded when DidFinishLoad is called for the main frame.

suffix.name: ClearKey
suffix.label: Requests for the Clear Key key system.

suffix.name: Unknown
suffix.label: Requests for an unknown or unsupported key system.

suffix.name: Widevine
suffix.label: Requests for the Widevine key system.

suffix.name: SuggestionFetcher
suffix.label: Fetcher for content suggestions on mobile NTP

suffix.name: SuggestionFetcherRareNTPUser
suffix.label: Fetcher for content suggestions on mobile NTP - rare NTP users

suffix.name: SuggestionFetcherActiveNTPUser
suffix.label: Fetcher for content suggestions on mobile NTP - active NTP users

suffix.name: SuggestionFetcherActiveSuggestionsConsumer
suffix.label: Fetcher for content suggestions on mobile NTP - active suggestions consumers

suffix.name: SuggestionThumbnailFetcher
suffix.label: Fetcher for article thumbnails on mobile NTP

suffix.name: LT_32kB
suffix.label: Sliced for resources smaller than 32kB and larger than 2kB.

suffix.name: LT_512kB
suffix.label: Sliced for resources smaller than 512kB and larger than 32kB.

suffix.name: InliningApplicable
suffix.label: Resources that the chunk inlining is applicable.
suffix.obsolete: This experiment was turned down, see https://crbug.com/703188.

suffix.name: NotPrefetched
suffix.label: Number of non-prefetched pages on each type of network.

suffix.name: Prefetched
suffix.label: Number of prefetched pages on each type of network.

suffix.name: Bluetooth
suffix.label: Page load time in bluetooth network.

suffix.name: Cellular
suffix.label: Page load time in cellular network.

suffix.name: None
suffix.label: Page load time without network connection.

suffix.name: Unknown
suffix.label: Page load time in unknown type of network.

suffix.name: WiFi
suffix.label: Page load time in WiFi network.

suffix.name: NotPrefetched
suffix.label: Page load time for non-prefetched pages.

suffix.name: Prefetched
suffix.label: Page load time for prefetched pages.

suffix.name: Host
suffix.label: Page load time for prefetched pages based on main frame host.

suffix.name: Url
suffix.label: Page load time for prefetched pages based on main frame URL.
Covers statistics when the maximum subresources that can be prefetched is set to 25.
Covers statistics when the maximum subresources that can be prefetched is set to 50.

suffix.name: Count
suffix.label: Predicted accuracy stats as the raw numbers.

suffix.name: PercentOfTotalPrefetched
suffix.label: Predicted accuracy stats as percent of total resources prefetched.

suffix.name: Max5Clients
suffix.label: Two to five Clients in the ResourceScheduler.

suffix.name: Max15Clients
suffix.label: Six to fifteen Clients in the ResourceScheduler.

suffix.name: Max30Clients
suffix.label: Sixteen to thirty Clients in the ResourceScheduler.

suffix.name: Over30Clients
suffix.label: Over thirty Clients in the ResourceScheduler.

suffix.name: NoScoutGroup
suffix.label: User sees the legacy Extended Reporting opt-in

suffix.name: ScoutGroup
suffix.label: User sees the new Extended Reporting opt-in

suffix.name: First_LeftUnchecked
suffix.label: User saw opt-in for first time and left it unchecked

suffix.name: First_Enabled
suffix.label: User saw opt-in for first time and enabled it

suffix.name: First_Disabled
suffix.label: User saw opt-in for first time and disabled it

suffix.name: Repeat_LeftEnabled
suffix.label: User saw opt-in again and left it enabled

suffix.name: Repeat_Disabled
suffix.label: User saw opt-in again and changed it to disabled

suffix.name: Repeat_Enabled
suffix.label: User saw opt-in again and changed it to enabled

suffix.name: Repeat_LeftDisabled
suffix.label: User saw opt-in again and left it disabled

suffix.name: SecurityInterstitial
suffix.label: One of the Security Interstitials (malware, SSL, etc)

suffix.name: SBER1Pref
suffix.label: Value of the legacy Extended Reporting pref

suffix.name: SBER2Pref
suffix.label: Value of the new Extended Reporting pref

suffix.name: Checked
suffix.label: Resources that were checked. Logged before the resource starts loading and again for each redirect.

suffix.name: Safe
suffix.label: Resources that were checked and deemed safe. Logged when the URL check is completed.

suffix.name: Skipped
suffix.label: Resources that were not checked because they are not active-ish content types. Only used on mobile. Logged before the resource request starts.

suffix.name: Unsafe
suffix.label: Resources that were checked and classified as unsafe. Logged when the URL check is completed.

suffix.name: UnsafePrefetchCanceled
suffix.label: Pre-fetched resources that were checked and classified as unsafe. Logged as the request is canceled.

suffix.name: FrameRate
suffix.label: Frames per second sent, in fps. The value is reported when a stream is removed and is calculated as the total number of frames in this layer, divided by the duration of the call.

suffix.name: Qp
suffix.label: Average quantizer (qp) of frames sent. The value is reported when a stream is removed and is calculated, for this layer, as the sum of all qp values divided the number of frames.

suffix.name: TargetBitrate
suffix.label: Average target bitrate in kbps. The value is reported when a stream is removed and is calculated as the sum of all target bitrates for this layer (sampled after frame has been encoded) divided by the total number of frames for this layer.

suffix.name: from_data_saver
suffix.label: Interstitial for a resource classified as unsafe by the Data Saver service.

suffix.name: from_device
suffix.label: Interstitial for a resource classified as unsafe by the Safe Browsing database via either {Local,Remote}SafeBrowsingDatabaseManager.

suffix.name: from_device_v4
suffix.label: Interstitial for a resource classified as unsafe by the Safe Browsing database version 4 via either {Local,Remote}SafeBrowsingDatabaseManager.

suffix.name: from_client_side_detection
suffix.label: Interstitial for a resource classified as unsafe by the client side detection.

suffix.name: InstalledWorker.MainScript
suffix.label: Main script for an installed worker

suffix.name: InstalledWorker.ImportedScript
suffix.label: Imported script for an installed worker

suffix.name: NewWorker.MainScript
suffix.label: Main script for a new (not installed) worker

suffix.name: NewWorker.ImportedScript
suffix.label: Imported script for new (not installed) worker

suffix.name: GEOFENCING
suffix.label: GEOFENCING
suffix.obsolete: Deprecated as of 5/2016 because geofencing got removed.

suffix.name: NAVIGATION_HINT_LINK_MOUSE_DOWN
suffix.label: NAVIGATION_HINT_LINK_MOUSE_DOWN
suffix.obsolete: This experiment was turned down, see https://crbug.com/616502.

suffix.name: NAVIGATION_HINT_LINK_TAP_UNCONFIRMED
suffix.label: NAVIGATION_HINT_LINK_TAP_UNCONFIRMED
suffix.obsolete: This experiment was turned down, see https://crbug.com/616502.

suffix.name: NAVIGATION_HINT_LINK_TAP_DOWN
suffix.label: NAVIGATION_HINT_LINK_TAP_DOWN
suffix.obsolete: This experiment was turned down, see https://crbug.com/616502.

histogram_suffixes.name: ServiceWorker.NavigationHint
histogram_suffixes.obsolete: This experiment was turned down, see https://crbug.com/616502.

suffix.name: IsRunningNavigationHintTask
suffix.label: Starting a service worker for a navigation hint.
suffix.obsolete: This experiment was turned down, see https://crbug.com/616502.

suffix.name: DuringStartup
suffix.label: The worker started up during browser startup.

suffix.name: NewProcess
suffix.label: A new process was created for the worker (or is asyncly being created, depending on the histogram).

suffix.name: ExistingProcess
suffix.label: An existing process was used for the worker.

suffix.name: StartWorkerDuringStartup
suffix.label: Started a worker during browser startup.

suffix.name: StartWorkerNewProcess
suffix.label: Started a worker in a new process.

suffix.name: StartWorkerExistingProcess
suffix.label: Started a worker in an existing process.

suffix.name: StartingWorker
suffix.label: The activated worker was already starting up.

suffix.name: RunningWorker
suffix.label: The activated worker was already running.

suffix.name: Batch
suffix.label: The time to perform the 'batch' operation on a ServiceWorker Cache, which batches other basic operations.

suffix.name: Keys
suffix.label: The time to perform the 'keys' operation on a ServiceWorker Cache, which returns all of the keys in the cache.

suffix.name: Match
suffix.label: The time to perform the 'match' operation on a ServiceWorker Cache, which does a lookup.

suffix.name: MatchAll
suffix.label: The time to perform the 'matchAll' operation on a ServiceWorker Cache, which does a mass cache lookup.

suffix.name: Delete
suffix.label: The time to perform the 'delete' operation on a ServiceWorker CacheStorage, which deletes a cache.

suffix.name: Has
suffix.label: The time to perform the 'has' operation on a ServiceWorker CacheStorage, which returns if the cache exists.

suffix.name: Keys
suffix.label: The time to perform the 'keys' operation on a ServiceWorker CacheStorage, which returns all of the cache names.

suffix.name: Match
suffix.label: The time to perform the 'match' operation on a ServiceWorker CacheStorage, which does a shortcut cache lookup.

suffix.name: Open
suffix.label: The time to perform the 'open' operation on a ServiceWorker CacheStorage, which gets or creates a cache.

suffix.name: docs
suffix.label: Custom histogram for Google Docs and Drive

suffix.name: ntp
suffix.label: Custom histogram for New Tab Page

suffix.name: MemoryPressure
suffix.label: Total tabs involved in session restore that encountered memory pressure.

suffix.name: MemoryPressure_Loaded
suffix.label: Tabs fully loaded before memory pressure.

suffix.name: MemoryPressure_LoadStarted
suffix.label: Tabs started to load before memory pressure.

suffix.name: NoMemoryPressure
suffix.label: Total tabs involved in a session restore that did not encounter memory pressure.

suffix.name: NoMemoryPressure_Loaded
suffix.label: Tabs fully loaded in a session restore that did not encounter memory pressure.

suffix.name: NoMemoryPressure_LoadStarted
suffix.label: Tabs started to load in a session restore that did not encounter memory pressure.

suffix.name: DefaultSearch
suffix.label: Reset state for default search engine.

suffix.name: psk
suffix.label: Network is security with WPA or WPA-2 (aka RSN)

suffix.name: Fast
suffix.label: Fast start by skipping normal chrome.dll startup.

suffix.name: AndroidAccountConsistencyFirstRunActions
suffix.label: Signin Flow shown on android after Account Consistency flag was enabled.

suffix.name: FirstRun
suffix.label: First execution of the reconciler after the profile was loaded or the new_profile_management flag was toggled.

suffix.name: SubsequentRun
suffix.label: Execution of the reconciler triggered by some other change of state.

suffix.name: NewAccount
suffix.label: Using a new account, in the sign-in promo.

suffix.name: NotDefault
suffix.label: Using not the default account, in the sign-in promo.

suffix.name: WithDefault
suffix.label: Using the default account, in the sign-in promo.

suffix.name: WithIndex
suffix.label: The Simple Cache index was loaded.

suffix.name: WithoutIndex
suffix.label: The Simple Cache index was not yet loaded.

suffix.name: SSLForProxies
suffix.label: SSLClientSocket wrapping the TCPClient socket eventually used for connection to a proxy

suffix.name: SSLforHTTPSProxy
suffix.label: SSLClientSocket wrapping the TCPClient socket eventually used for connection to an HTTPS proxy

suffix.name: TCP
suffix.label: plain, no proxy, no SSL socket

suffix.name: TCPforHTTPProxy
suffix.label: TCPClientSocket eventually used for connection to an HTTP proxy

suffix.name: TCPforHTTPSProxy
suffix.label: TCPClientSocket eventually used for connection to an HTTPS proxy

suffix.name: TCPforSOCKS
suffix.label: TCPClientSocket eventually used for connection to a SOCKS proxy

suffix.name: cwndMin16
suffix.label: using dynamic cwnd policy no lower than 16

suffix.name: cwndMin10
suffix.label: using dynamic cwnd policy no lower than 10

suffix.name: npn_with_http
suffix.label: with NPN negotiated but using HTTP instead of SPDY

suffix.name: npn_with_spdy
suffix.label: with NPN negotiated and using SPDY

suffix.name: NoLoad
suffix.label: Abandoned before first main frame load.

suffix.name: WarmStartup
suffix.label: Startup was warm (almost no hard faults).

suffix.name: LukewarmStartup
suffix.label: Startup was neither warm nor cold.

suffix.name: ThreadNowDuration
suffix.label: Duration is in thread CPU time.

suffix.name: StartWorkerExistingProcess
suffix.label: The worker started up in an existing process

suffix.name: File
suffix.label: Appending a file with a known size.

suffix.name: FileSystem
suffix.label: Appending a filesystem object with known size.

suffix.name: OnMemoryPressure
suffix.label: Eviction was triggered because of memory pressure signal.

suffix.name: SizeExceededMaxDiskSpace
suffix.label: Eviction was triggered because the total size exceeded maximum available disk space

suffix.name: SizeExceededInMemoryLimit
suffix.label: Eviction was triggered because the total size exceeded maximum in memory size allwed

suffix.name: LocalGoogle
suffix.label: Local New Tab page for Google.

suffix.name: LocalOther
suffix.label: Local New Tab page for a non-Google provider.

suffix.name: Other
suffix.label: New Tab page for a non-Google provider.

suffix.name: Perceived
suffix.label: The time it takes to show something on the screen after the user selects a tab. This might be a fake snapshot or it might just be the time it takes to show the real content if no snapshot was available.

suffix.name: Actual
suffix.label: The time it takes to show a real live frame from the renderer on the screen after the user selects a tab. This doesn not include fake snapshots or other tricks, but the actual time to get real interactable content displayed.

suffix.name: MayBlock
suffix.label: Applies to tasks posted with MayBlock() or WithBaseSyncPrimitives().

suffix.name: BackgroundTaskPriority
suffix.label: Applies to tasks posted with a BACKGROUND priority.

suffix.name: UserVisibleTaskPriority
suffix.label: Applies to tasks posted with a USER_VISIBLE priority.

suffix.name: UserBlockingTaskPriority
suffix.label: Applies to tasks posted with a USER_BLOCKING priority.

suffix.name: Vp9
suffix.label: Video codec: VP9. QP range: 0-255. No spatial layers.

suffix.label: Video codec: VP9. QP range: 0-255. Spatial layer 0.

suffix.label: Video codec: VP9. QP range: 0-255. Spatial layer 1.

suffix.name: Vp9.S2
suffix.label: Video codec: VP9. QP range: 0-255. Spatial layer 2.

suffix.name: Browser
suffix.label: The session is restricted to the period that the browser is displaying a regular page.

suffix.name: Fullscreen
suffix.label: The session is restricted to the period that the browser is displaying fullscreen content.

suffix.name: WebVR
suffix.label: The session is restricted to the period that browser is displaying WebVR contents.

suffix.name: others
suffix.label: Fonts other than Roboto and Open Sans

suffix.name: MissedCacheAndInterventionNotTriggered
suffix.label: On missed cache and intervention not triggered

suffix.name: MissedCacheAndInterventionTriggered
suffix.label: On missed cache and intervention triggered

suffix.name: Average
suffix.label: The average over the time interval

suffix.name: Max
suffix.label: The maximum over the time interval

suffix.name: Min
suffix.label: The minimum over the time interval

suffix.name: Disabled
suffix.label: Neither extra webstore link is visible

suffix.name: FooterLink
suffix.label: Link in bottom right of footer

suffix.name: InlineDefault
suffix.label: Inline layout style, default browser promo only

suffix.name: SectionedDefault
suffix.label: Sectioned layout style, default browser promo only
